OFFER_ON_ALL_50: Discounts up to 50% on these Diplomas
OUR_STORY_DEC: We started in 2016 with a training and development company for the Egyptian market, and we succeeded and expanded, but without a clear specialization. After a short period of time, we found some people talking to us and involving us in changing their lives, and that after the diplomas in psychological and family counseling, their lives changed and things changed with them. They realize that science solves a lot of problems just by understanding your partner's personality. Once you know and understand the requirements of marriage well, it becomes more effective. With the large number of divorces in the community, psychological crises, depression, suicide and perversions, we decided to participate in changing society, to contribute even a little to improving the family, education and the Egyptian home. That is why we have become the largest platform for teaching psychological studies in Egypt and the Arab world. All thanks to the hardworking supporters, lecturers and doctors are a great reason for our success and the Ministry of Social Solidarity for supporting it with certificates and credits.
STPE_1_DEC: In our platform, you will find many accredited courses and diplomas. Choose the diploma you want
STPE_2_DEC: After subscribing to the diploma, a large collection of no less than 30 recorded videos will be opened for you to benefit from
STPE_3_DEC: After completing the course, you will take an exam to pass this course and get your certificate
JOIN_US_DESCRIPTION: Join a large number of counselors and psychologists from different countries of the world
JOIN_US_1: The ability to work from anywhere while saving time, effort and cost.
JOIN_US_2: The ability to communicate with customers by text or through audio and video.
JOIN_US_4: Clients from all over the world not just your country
JOIN_US_5: Record notes and medical reports of your clients on the site.
JOIN_US_6: You can send reports to your clients.
